alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 4:52PM CDT until May 18 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Foard County in northern Texas... Northeastern Knox County in northern Texas... Northwestern Baylor County in northern Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vera, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Foard, northeastern Knox and northwestern Baylor Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
